attributes.action: stop the government from ripping off hard working people...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ... with the likes of working tax credit, when you get a letter off them every year stating that you owe them money, they shouldnt have gave you to much, you then have to struggle to get the money and othen puts people into debt

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
